document.full_text: in a sophisticated attack, at least one suicide bomber entered the police headquarters in kandahar on friday and detonated himself, killing a police chief and two policemen, officials said.
document.title: blast kills afghan police chief and 2 officers in kandahar
lines_and_colors: in a sophisticated attack, at least one suicide bomber entered the police headquarters in kandahar on friday and detonated himself, killing a police chief and two policemen, officials said.
